notesStmt.note: Edward Grier concludes that this manuscript was likely written before 1855 because of its similarity to several of the notebooks that Whitman wrote from that period (Notebooks and Unpublished Prose Manuscripts [New York: New York University Press, 1984], 6:2110). The tone of the statements is also consistent with Whitman's early journalistic and editorial persona, and it's possible that this was a draft of a piece of journalism. An image of the verso of this manuscript is currently unavailable.
